name: Freshkills Skatepark
description: Modern skatepark built on the transformed Freshkills landfill site. Clean concrete with a mix of transition and street features.
history: Part of the massive Freshkills Park redevelopment, opened as one of the newest parks on the island.
bestTimes: Weekend mornings before crowds. Great in fall.
transitDirections: SIR to Richmond Valley, then S74 bus. Or drive — parking available.

detailedNotes.terrain: Features include bowl, rails, quarter pipes, manual pad. Well-maintained concrete construction.
detailedNotes.culture: Part of the Staten Island skate scene in Travis. Part of the massive Freshkills Park redevelopment, opened as one of the newest parks on the island.
detailedNotes.tips: Best approach: SIR to Richmond Valley, then S74 bus. Or drive — parking available.. Weekend mornings before crowds. Great in fall.
detailedNotes.warnings: Public skatepark — standard park etiquette applies.
